Name: Fantasteroids
About the game: Enjoy a refreshing arcade-like blast to the past with Fantasteroids. A game with a simple concept, which is easy to pick up but hard to master. You will need incredible precision, an unblinking eye to watch for hazards, and a stamina to match a marathon runner's. Features Fast-paced gameplay A variety of different modes and experiences for you to choose from Over 20 different characters and skins to unlock Steam leaderboards so you can play and compete with people around the world!
